verses.verse: Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, He that entereth <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sheepfold <S%G4263><s%> <S%G833><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> climbeth up <S%G305><s%> some other way <S%G237><s%>, the same <S%G1565><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a thief <S%G2812><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a robber <S%G3027><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> he that entereth in <S%G1525><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the shepherd <S%G4166><s%> of the sheep <S%G4263><s%>.

To him <S%G5129><s%> the porter <S%G2377><s%> openeth <S%G455><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the sheep <S%G4263><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he calleth <S%G2564><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> leadeth <S%G1806><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1806><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> a stranger <S%G245><s%> will they <S%G190><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> follow <S%G190><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> will flee <S%G5343><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> they know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of strangers <S%G245><s%>.

This <S%G5026><s%> parable <S%G3942><s%> spake <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G1565><s%> understood <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> what things <S%G5101><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spake <S%G2980><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> of the sheep <S%G4263><s%>.
